org.latency4j.spring

Class Latency4JBeanPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.latency4j.spring.Latency4JBeanPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanPostProcessor

    public class Latency4JBeanPostProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanPostProcessor

    A Spring bean post processor implementation which, proxies Latency4J annotated classes. Calls to the annotated methods are intercepted and monitored by an Latency4J dynamic proxy.

    • Constructor Summary

                                                        java.lang.String beanName)

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        beanName - The name of the bean to process.

      • postProcessAfterInitialization

        public java.lang.Object postProcessAfterInitialization(java.lang.Object bean,
                                                       java.lang.String beanName)
                                                throws org.springframework.beans.BeansException

        If the given bean contains Latency4J annotated methods, this method will create and return a dynamic Latency4J proxy to it.

        If the bean is not annotated, this method will return the unmodified bean reference as supplied in the parameter list.

        Specified by:
        postProcessAfterInitialization in interface org.springframework.beans.factory.config.BeanPostProcessor
        Parameters:
        bean - The bean to process.
        beanName - The name of the bean to process.
        Returns:
        An Latency4J proxy to the specified bean if, and only if, the bean is annotated. Else it will return the bean reference as supplied in the argument list.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.beans.BeansException

      • getMonitorFactory

        public AsynchronousLatencyMonitorFactory getMonitorFactory()

        Accessor for the factory from which the monitors used by the dynamic proxies are created.

        Returns:
        The factory used by the processor to create monitors used by the dynamic proxies also created by the processor.

      • setMonitorFactory

        public void setMonitorFactory(AsynchronousLatencyMonitorFactory monitorFactory)

        Sets the factory from which the monitors used by the dynamic proxies are created.

        Parameters:
        monitorFactory - The factory to be used by the processor to create monitors used by the dynamic proxies also created by the processor.
